description.value:
In times of stress, you get headaches. Psionic energy builds up in your mind until you feel like your head is going to explode. If youâ€™re not careful, it actually does explode, radiating psychic waves that harm friends and enemies alike.

Benefit: Psionic energy bursts from your body in an iridescent shimmer.

Drawback: When you gain the bleeding, frightened, or weakened condition, you must use Psychic Blast as a free triggered action.
